value.title: Researchers Harness Brain Waves of Paralyzed Man to Communicate With Him
value.excerpt: In a medical first, researchers harnessed the brain waves of a paralyzed man unable to speak — and turned what he intended to say into sentences on a computer screen.

value.title: China grants tax breaks, policy leeway to turn Shanghai into powerhouse for AI, chips, planes and pharmaceuticals
